## Comparison of Measures

| Measure | Description | Strengths | Limitations |
|--------|-------------|-----------|-------------|
| Mean | Average... | Utilizes all data points | Sensitive to outliers |
| Median | Middle... | Robust against outliers | Doesn't use all values |
| Mode | Most frequent | Useful for categorical | May not exist or be unique |

## Basic Probability Rules

1. **Addition Rule**:
   $$
   P(A \cup B) = P(A) + P(B)
   $$
2. **Multiplication Rule**:
   $$
   P(A \cap B) = P(A) \times P(B)
   $$
